sentence:
The differences in the frequency of staphylomas for each eye shape were not significant except for the spherical type.Comparison of the Volume Between HM Eyes and Non–HM Eyes
The distribution of the eye volume in HM and non-HM eyes is shown in Figure 1.
The volume was significantly smaller in the cylindrical type than the other types (Table 3 and Fig. 2A).
The eyes with the spherical shape had significantly shorter ALs than the other eye shapes (Fig. 2B).

Comparison of the Volume Between HM Eyes and Non–HM Eyes
The distribution of the eye volume in HM and non-HM eyes is shown in Figure 1.
The distribution of the eye volume in HM and non-HM eyes is shown in Figure 1.
The volume was significantly smaller in the cylindrical type than the other types (Table 3 and Fig. 2A).
The eyes with the spherical shape had significantly shorter ALs than the other eye shapes (Fig. 2B).
The volume was significantly smaller in the cylindrical type than the other types (Table 3 and Fig. 2A).
The eyes with the spherical shape had significantly shorter ALs than the other eye shapes (Fig. 2B).

In HM eyes, the volume was the smallest in cylindrical-shaped eyes, and there was a significant difference in the eye volume between the cylindrical type and the other types except the spherical type (Fig. 2A).
